alert.note: Alert for Eastern Toole and Liberty; Hill County (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 09 at 3:46PM MDT by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Liberty and west central Hill Counties through 415 PM MDT... At 345 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 13 miles north of Inverness, or 23 miles northeast of Chester, moving northwest at 40 mph. HAZARD...Half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of northeastern Liberty and west central Hill Counties. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Toole and Liberty; Hill County
